message.body: Is it possible for you to create like a two different schedule
Because currently, whoever is playing Mr. Gao has like another shoot on the 12th
He's still debating to drop the other one and all
So I'm thinking of having a 16-hr shoot for the 11th with like 4-5 hr shoot for the 12th for the first version
Second version is as what we have right now
... I'm not sure I'm following. You just want me to come up with a back up schedule by front loading the 11th with all of gao's scenes?
Ok, I'll write one up... Hopefully we won't have to do that though. 16 hours will be crazy.
Yeah I don't like to go thru that either. I need sleep and my roommate ruins my sleep half of the time. So shorter the schedule the better
